bibl.title: A Twisted Hermes. Another View of an Enigmatic Spell.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. sans No. d'Inv. [ed.: Eric G. Turner, The Marrow of Hermes, Images of Man in Ancient and Medieval Thought. Studia Gerardo Verbeke dicata (Louvain, 1976) pp. 169-173 et 1 pl.]. - En réponse à: Christopher A. Faraone, Hermes but no Marrow: Another Look at a Puzzling Magic Spelll, ZPE 72 (1988) pp. 279-286.
bibl.seg: Versnel H.S., A Twisted Hermes. Another View of an Enigmatic Spell.
